text: David Nicholls (born 3 November 1956) is an English former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. ==Career== Born in Bradford, Newton began his career with Huddersfield Town. He joined Bradford City in August 1975.Frost, p. 403 He made 4 league appearances for the club.Frost, p. 386 Heleft the club in August 1976 to sign for Gainsborough Trinity. He also played for England Schools. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Gainsborough Trinity F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: David Nicholls (footballer, born 1956)
